original_text: From Merari's descendants there was Hosah. He had four sons: Shimri was his firstborn son. His father chose him to be the leader among his sons, but he was not the oldest of them.
korean_text: 므라리 자손 중 호사에게도 아들들이 있으니 그의 장자는 시므리라 시므리는 본래 맏아들이 아니나 그의 아버지가 장자로 삼았고

sentences.original_text: From Merari's descendants there was Hosah.
His father chose him to be the leader
but he was not the oldest of them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그들 중 가장 나이가 많지는 않았다.
